column2: ENGLISH
Vampire Predator Types
PoD: Vampire Edition Rules
V5
Vampire: the Masquerade 5th edition. Vampires have preferred types of being predators.
Off
Predator Types will NOT be used.
Choose Prey
Choosing your predator type defines our primary prey and the way you hunt.  You can change this as time goes on.
Predator Type: Farmer
This vampire prefers to feed from animals.
Predator Type: Bloodleech
This vampire prefers to feed on the blood of other vampires!
Predator Type: Phlebotomist
This vampire acquires vitae under the guise of a doctor performing bloodletting.
Predator Type: Bedlamite
This vampire preys upon the mad.  They may also be insane, or at least appear as such to their prey.
Predator Type: Cenobite
This vampire has a herd at religious institution like a monastery.
Predator Type: Alleycat
This vampire stalks and violently attacks mortals to gain the blood.  It is a vulgar approach.
Predator Type: Cauchemar
This vampire feeds only upon those who are asleep.
Predator Type: Familias
This vampire feeds almost exclusively from one particular family dynasty.  They may even be related to the family
column3: at least that is what the family thinks.

column2: Predator Type: Footpad
This lick runs with the lowlifes of society, taking the blood of the impoverished. If they disappear, the authorities show no interest.
Predator Type: Consensualist
This vampire only feeds from the willing.  This greatly complicates the Masquerade.
Predator Type: Osiris
This vampire leads a blood cult, like in ancient times.  The kine worship and offer themselves freely to this blood god.
Predator Type: Siren
This vampire seduces lovers to drain their blood through the kiss.
Predator Type: Gentry
This vampire has a position of some status in mortal society.  They use that status to hunt the rich and powerful.  No one will believe that someone of such refinement is a monster.
How Do You Hunt?

A vampire is a predator of the night. The way I hunt may help me develop other skills and abilities to stalk my chosen prey.  It may also impact how well I can keep the Tradition of the Silence of Blood--The Masquerade. Upon what do I feed?
Kine
Animals
Kindred
You hunger for the blood of humans. This leads to more questions...
You prefer to feed on animals. Its no more harmful than kine eating a steak.
You prefer to slake your thirst from the veins of other vampires--deep, thick, potent blood.
Sating the Hunger

I do not deny the nature of what I have become.  A vampire drinks the blood of living people.  It is the blood in their veins that calls to the Beast.  I look at them and see their skin flush with blood.  I can smell their blood inside them. I can not look at them without feeling the hunger grow. It is always growing. How will I hunt these hapless mortals?
I fight for my food. I take blood by my might.
I can talk people out of their own life if I need to.
Through stealth and deceit, I will steal their essence.
With my knowledge, I can acquire vitae.
I'll have it rare. Very rare.

You only feed from animals. Your Hunger constantly gnaws at you, but you have not killed a single human being so far (except perhaps that one time), and you intend to keep it that way. You have a [vamp_dinner.Culture.GetName] you can feed on tonight
Its sort of like borscht.
Prey Animal
Some vampires drink the blood animals, rather than humans
Dark, Thick, Potent

You drink from other vampires, either by hunting, coercion or by taking Blood as payment. Unfortunately, this practice is usually forbidden in Kindred society. It is either risky or requires a position of enviable power. Fortunately, kindred blood is so much more powerful than the blood of the kine.
Top of the food chain.
Hunting like an Alley Cat
A combative assault-feeder, you stalk, overpower, and drink from whomever you can, when you can. You are comfortable with an unlife of stalking, attacking, feeding, and escaping.
I am a wolf among the sheep.
A Silver Tongue Between Fangs
My charisma allows me to easily acquire blood. The only question left is what is my preferred herd.
I only feed upon the willing.
All who desire me.
Mortals of class and distinction.
My devoted worshippers.
Stealthy, a Thief Called Death
Skilled in the ways of deceit and subterfuge, I am like a spider.  Who do I catch in my web of lies?
Those who are sleeping.
I am the "friend" of a particular family.
The poor are so grateful for scraps.
More than Dreamt of in Philosophy
I am able to use my scholarship for access those vulnerable to my predilections. Which community suffers from my intellect?
Bloodletting is part of medicine.
No one believes the ravings of the mad.
Cloistered halls of the faithful.
Choose By Your Own Free Will

You never feed against your victim's free will. Some kindred look down upon this as a violation of the Silence of Blood--the Masquerade.  For your ethics, its a risk you are willing to take. You friend, [vamp_dinner.GetFirstName], lets you feed from [vamp_dinner.GetHerHis] veins.
Will you do this for me?
Bloody Kisses

You feed almost exclusively during or while feigning sex to conceal your carnivorous nature. You have mastered the art of seduction. You think of yourself as a sexy beast, but in your darkest moments, you fear that you're at best a problematic lover, though are really something far worse. Your primary lover is [vamp_dinner.GetFirstName], for as long as [vamp_dinner.GetSheHe] lasts.
Is it hot in here?
Blue Blood

You rely on your familiarity with the noble etiquette to feed exclusively upon nobility and wealthy of society that believes you to be one of them. Your victims adore you for your perceived high social status, and the ones who understand what you are disbelieved. You have ghouled [vamp_dinner.GetDynName], a socialite in high society, as part of your entourage. [vamp_dinner.GetSheHeCap] is a suitable sycophant.
You wouldn't want jeopardize your position?
A Temple of Blood

You lead a cult. You feed from your worshippers, who treat you as a deity. You always have access to easy blood, but followers breed problems with the authorities and organized religion. While you risk breaching the Silence of Blood, to be worshipped like the ancients of old is intoxicating. You have rewarded the kine priest of your temple, [vamp_dinner.GetDynName], with your blood. Long may [vamp_dinner.GetSheHe] serve you.
I Am A Blood God!
The Thing of Nightmares
You rely on your abilities to feed from sleeping victims. If they never wake during the feeding, they won't know you exist
Sweet dreams.
Family Secrets Cast Dark Shadows

You feed covertly from a mortal family. You watch over a particular dynasty, the [vamp_dinner.GetOnlyDynastyName], as your herd.  The family patriarch, [vamp_dinner.GetDynName] is your ghoul and abets your bleeding of his family. Some kindred see such a relationship as a breach of the Masquerade waiting to happen. Wiser Kindred may massacre the dynasty if they find out your secret.
Come give your elder a kiss.
Blood Flows in the Gutters

You rely on your familiarity with the poor and feed exclusively upon derelicts and other castaways of society that believes you to be one of them. Your victims adore you for your status in the  streets, and the ones who understand what you are disbelieved. [vamp_dinner.GetFirstName] is your ghoul and has your back on the streets..
Rich and poor both bleed red.
Equalizing the Humors

Bloodletting is the withdrawal of blood from a patient to prevent or cure illness and disease. It was based on an ancient system of medicine in which blood and other bodily fluids were regarded as "humors" that had to remain in proper balance to maintain health. As a physician, you drink your fill from patients who only think they are sick.
Doctor's orders.
We aRe AlL MAd iN HeRE!

You rely on your familiarity with the insane and feed exclusively on the mad that believe you to be one of them. Your victims adore you for your status and the see you as someone who really understands them, and the ones who understand what you are disbelieved. [vamp_dinner.GetFirstName] seems drawn to you for inexplicable reasons.
Tell me about your mother.
...and drink of my blood

You rely on your familiarity with ecclesiastical practices to feed exclusively upon cloistered religious communities that believe you to be one of them. Your victims adore you for your presumed piety and the ones who understand what you are disbelieved and can be branded heretics and apostates. [vamp_dinner.GetDynName] is your ghoul among the flock, and ensures that noone disturbs you during the day.
We walk together in faith.

Old Friend" of the Family;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
opinion_herd;One of my Herd;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
